website_summaries.verdict: Expensive stand, but it provides a nice option to adjust the height of the laptop screen.
pros: Very lightweight stand that will fold down to a small size that's perfect for travel
Supports a wide variety of laptop models
Rubber inserts hold laptop in place
cons: Very expensive versus other laptop stands

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain, but there may be a quality control issue.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect for anyone with back and neck pain. Love this laptop stand so much that when it got lost in my move to a new house I bought another! Unfortunately the new one I have does not level the laptop out properly, causing the laptop to be lower on the left side. Noticeable enough that the stand is not useable for more than a little bit. Would love to know how to fix it, any advice would be very helpful. 2 stars because there seems to be know way to reach out to the roost team for support or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a MacBook Pro 13”
customer_reviews.text: Other stands couldn’t get the MacBook at the right angle/height (either too low or didn’t angle the screen in a way to allow it to open up all the way). This is also very light, stores small, and doesn’t take up a lot of desk space when in use. Takes a little getting used to when opening it up/storing it, but with the current work from home situation many of us are in, that’s not a problem, and when it comes time to pack it up and carry it around, it’s good to know it will fit into my bag without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost 2 years, and it still works perfectly. It is great for me, a student with cubital tunnel syndrome. Good ergonomics is important, but I can’t carry heavy bags, as they compresses my shoulder and that exacerbates the condition. This lightweight solution is ideal for me. I have also discovered that the included dictation program in my macbook pro is more accurate when the laptop is in this stand. I use my Macbook’s internal microphone, and I don’t know if it works better simply because the stand places the microphone closer to my mouth, or if exposing most of the bottom of the laptop changes the acoustics, but regardless, it has been incredibly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Best practcle purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago and it has to be one of my more practical buys. I have a shoulder-neck injury so the bent position my neck was held in caused serious discomfort. The Roost makes working on my Mac air significantly more comfortable. Yes, I had to buy a keyboard but for me it’s wirth it. Instead of being hit-on while I worked at my favorite cafes, fellow patrons were surprisingly attracted to my laptop stand. If flirtation is what one wants, this could be a nice ice-breaker. This is amazingly lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop stand I’ve ever used - it will save your neck!
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop stand I’ve ever used. It’s stable, lightweight, compact, gives great height, very adjustable, nonskid, durable. It exceeds expectations on all my requirements, which is not easy. Well worth the cost in terms of product quality, product function and health benefits. *Not* using it is a pain in the neck, literally. I’ve recommended this product to all my colleagues to attend conferences and meetings and spend dozens of hours at hotel conference tables and hotel room desks to save them from neck pain and problems associated with “laptop hunch”. It travels extremely well even for the most demanding light packer.
customer_reviews.author: GrumpyDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for laptop users. Worth the price for quality and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without this! Let's face it, those of us who tap away all day in front of a laptop have terrible posture. I work at my kitchen island which is counter-height. The adjustable feature of the roost has been a game changer - it keeps my laptop at exactly the right height to maintain good posture whether I sit or stand. I've noticed a significant reduction in my neck and back pain, less tightness in my shoulder muscles and even reduced wrist pain since I now use a wireless keyboard and mouse. Plus it is lightweight, portable and you really notice the quality of the parts and construction. I'm very happy with this purchase despite the sticker shock.
customer_reviews.author: ninkabink

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable stand
customer_reviews.text: It works but feels overpriced. At first it feels a little awkward to fold the stand. , But you get the hang of it. For what it is and what it does it feels too expensive. Maybe your paying for it's portability and unique folding mechanics. But the rubber pieces that hold the laptop in place don't hold the laptop top securely if your transporting the stand with the laptop attached to it. I think the Rooster 2 addresses this issue, but I could not find it on Amazon. That would definitely be a nice feature to have.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent product.  Sturdy, stable, light, and compact.  I've been buying these for everybody.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is top notch! I got tired of looking down at my laptop, especially when I'm using a dual screen configuration. It makes my neck and back hurt after a while and I spend a lot of time on a computer (writing software and whatnot). I got one of these and now both screens are at eye level. The experience is great. The device is super stable (way more stable than I expected). It's also very light and compact. I slide it right into my briefcase with my laptop. I liked it so much, I bought one for each of my employees too. It's expensive, but it's worth every cent to me. Strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Patrick Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Don't settle for cheap copies; this one's strong
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfaction. Best gizmo I've ever bought for my laptops. I got from the manufacturer-inventor, and had an email discussion with him about cheap Chinese knock-offs. They're substantially inferior, patent infringements etc. Buy the real thing. They're surprisingly strong, light, come with a sleeve, so portable, and get better every time the inventor makes a new iteration. These stands have saved my eyes & neck....I can look directly at the screen, instead of hunching over. Saw it for the first time when someone was working at a library. Excellent tool.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gadget so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget so much! I've been dealing with upper back problems for several months now and I know it's because of my laptop setup. Constantly hunching down staring at the screen is just good for. Now I have this and the Logitech keyboard and a new setup that makes the screen level with my eyes with bending my neck down. I feel an improvement in my back and neck already. I also love how portable it is, just click, and go. I almost went with one of the stands that are bulkier and more substantial looking but I'm glad I chose this because it is strong without the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: CBrier

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye sore neck!
customer_reviews.text: A physical therapist told me one of the primary causes of chronic neck pain is people looking down at their computer when they work and straining their neck. I'm tall, so most of the other latptop risers I saw didn't look good enough, but then I saw the Roost and ordered it. No setup at all, I had it up and working in under a minute and it is already life changing. I never realized how much I was straining my neck to look down until I go this thing and now my laptop screen is level with my eyes. The difference is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Jon-O

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I might need to apply something to make it more solid. However, out of surprise, it is pretty good. With or without wireless keyboard/mouse, it enable me to use the laptop better! I like it. Updated Aug 20th, 2020: It has been awhile since I have this. Besides my original statement of its stability, I also like its really compact comparing to other stands my roommates have. I used it in my macbook pro 13" 2018 model and my dell new xps 13" 2020 model and have no issues at all! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Walt C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a NO GO for iPad with Maggie keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great Stand. I have been using the Nexstand for a few months now. I wanted something a bit slimmer and this is certainly a bit smaller yet sturdy. The problem is that the angle is too “steep” for the IPad Pro with Pro Magic keyboard. Your Screen only tilts back so many degrees and this stand is too “upright” so your screen only has the best angle at the roost stands lowest level. I will stick with the Nextstand as it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I chose to pay more and buy the Rooster stand because after reading reviews I thought it would be sturdier and hold my computer better...unfortunately neither is true. First, within 2 months a piece fell off (I'm still waiting for them to replace it - not sure when that will happen). Second, I recently bought a new laptop and the rubber pieces no longer firmly keep it in place, because it is thinner than my old computer. While I initially loved this lightweight stand, I now wish I had bought the cheaper version.
customer_reviews.author: labuscadora

customer_reviews.title: Live happier with a healthier spine and posture. This is the only way to use a laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This stand changed my life. I'm writing a dissertation which involves a lot of custom software development for my data analysis and on my computer for at least 6 hours a day, though sometimes 10. Before this stand came into my life, I had neck and back pain that never seemed to go away. Within a week or so of using this stand, my whole sitting posture changed and much of the pain went away. Now, neck and back pain are rare and when I don't use the roost, I feel the effects the next day. I'm constantly getting asked what this is, and I hope more people adopt this practice. Go Roost!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Woods

customer_reviews.title: Started out great - became challenging to open and close after a month
customer_reviews.text: After thoroughly looking at both the Roost & the non-brand knock off, I decided to support the original creators & pay the premium. I got the stand and loved it - at first. After a month or so, the open and close mechanism started having some troubles. While it still serves its purpose and works well once it's opened, opening and closing it has become difficult, and I'm fearful of it breaking almost every time I do so.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop stand for working from anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This goes with me everywhere and I'm asked for its name everywhere I go. I recommend pairing it with a macbook, a bluetooth apple magic trackpad, a bluetooth apple keyboard, and something in your lap that can cozily hold the trackpad + keyboard. I'm a computer programmer and a business owner and I use this at home, at the office, in cafés, and in hotels; it travels well and is usable everywhere. I like working in different places everyday, often in the same room or house, and this is really easy to move, takes a minute.
customer_reviews.author: cookie.dough

customer_reviews.title: needs to be two more levels of height adjustment
customer_reviews.text: A great laptop stand, but there needs to be at least two more levels of height adjustment for those of us with neck issues. There also needs to be some sort of "sound" to know the laptop has caught on to a specific height adjustment. Right now, I have to place the weight of the laptop and hope it catches on to the right height adjustment with no certainty.
customer_reviews.author: Tulkinghorn, Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant portable stand for laptops
customer_reviews.text: This ingenious and highly portable device is a life saver. Instead of being hunched over your screen, cramping your neck and bunching your shoulders, this collapsible stand allows you to lift your laptop to eye level and use a detachable bluetooth or wired keyboard and mouse to use your laptop. It's brilliant. Anyone who uses a laptop for a living, for fun, for school needs a Roost Laptop Stand. The Roost is now permanently in my laptop bag and goes with me everywhere. Very highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: LichMD

customer_reviews.title: You are paying for the quality...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying the Roost after trying one of its cheaper competitors. It is expensive for sure but the quality is much better and I feel my laptop is secure. The cheaper knockoff started to fall apart after a few weeks, and my laptop fell over easily. If you travel often with your laptop, definitely get the Roost. If you are going to just use the apparatus at home, then a cheaper knock off will probably do the trick (unless you have small children or pets or you laptop is older/heavier).
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: A Life Saver For Your Neck: A Chiropractor's Vote Of Confidence
customer_reviews.text: I can hardly imagine my life without my stand. Thank you, Roost. You've saved my neck and upper back. I currently work online and was having a lot of pain until I started using it. (I'm also a chiropractor, so this gets my highest approval!!!! Proper ergonomics along with good care is key to proper health.)
customer_reviews.author: Misty Funk

customer_reviews.title: I really love this thing. (I gave it 4 stars because it's almost $75.)
customer_reviews.text: Seriously: since I've had this, I haven't wanted to go back to staring *down* at my laptop. It is much more comfortable to look straight ahead (or even upward if you choose). It's height-adjustable, with some 4 or 5 different height settings. It's also collapsable into essentially a thin stick that fits anywhere. Very durable, too. I really like this product; just felt a bit pricey, but ultimately worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mfriedmann4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - Best Laptop Stand Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Relieved a large amount of lower back pain due to the strange positioning of the monitors at my workplace (they are attached to the corner of the cubicle, side by side, with swivels for adjustibility). I put this between them with my laptop on top, and it lines up perfectly. Portable, fits my computer perfectly (Macbook Air), sturdy, and has three levels of height (helpful for when I'm working at different desks from home versus work). Honestly, I was shopping for laptop stands for months, and I couldn't be happier with this one. You may end up spending less with another stand, but the ability to adjust and take this from place to place makes every extra dollar worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Evee

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sturdy, use with a separate keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Compact product and does the job. I can finally work at home with out my neck killing me. Sturdy product, I don't think it would be comfortable to use if you want to use the keyboard in the laptop. I use a separate keyboard / mouse combo with this stand and it is very comfortable. I love that you can fold this up place in it's storage bag and tuck in a draw. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Week 9 Feedback
customer_reviews.text: So, one of the white clip (left side) just slipped today right in front of me while I was using my computer, nearly causing my 2000$USD laptop to fall and crash (Razer Blade Stealth 13" 2018). Turns out the white clip will slowly slip over time if you left the laptop on the stand over a long period of time without moving it. I resolved to using Zip / Cable Tie to make sure the white clip does give away randomly in the future. I advice this to anyone who wishes to use Roost Stand as a perma / close to perma stand for your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Reg3e

customer_reviews.title: Great product & incredible customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product has been extremely useful. I'm no longer craning my neck down to look at my laptop while I work. I had to contact customer support as well with a product issue - they replied within a few hours and took care of me right away. 5/5 stars for an awesome product and 6/5 stars for incredible customer service. I highly recommend this product over the cheaper knockoff, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, portable and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and perfect for working at your kitchen table or favorite coffee shop. The form factor is terrific for portability and it’s very light making it easy to collapse and put in your bag. The adjustments make it easy to use for people or all heights. I’m 5’9” and was able to drop it down to the 3rd lowest setting to get my screen eye height.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyDigital

customer_reviews.title: Clever design!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm impressed! Its made of plastic, but its quite sturdy assuming you aren't typing directly on the laptop keyboard. Clever engineering! i like the fact that it folds down and is very portable to keep in the laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping you from hunching over with laptop
customer_reviews.text: Made huge difference in how I look at the laptop screen. Plus they fold up perfectly and work great for travel. I used these for a solid few months before COVID hit and loved it. Yes, they're a bit expensive but the convenience and way they fold down sold it for me. Also solid quality so I"m not too worried about these breaking any time soon. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Flingair

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: Tired of getting a sore neck from using my laptop on various tables that were not the right height for me, so I finally relented and shelled out the money for the roost. It is excellent for getting my laptop screen up to a reasonable height for a more ergonomic posture. It really does open and close quickly (follow the video instructions to avoid pinching fingers). It is really light and compact, so it's very portable. Plus people around you will be impressed by the practical design of this laptop stand. Highly recommended if you use a laptop in non-ergonomic environments.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I love it, except.....
customer_reviews.text: It seems like every time I take this little stand out, everyone goes, "Whoaa dude. That's sick, bro." It catches a lot more attention than I anticipated when I first decided to buy this stand. I love this stand because I work on my laptop most of the day, and when I want to travel, I can still get the benefit of an elevated screen... and I guess some occasional side glances from across the table. Honestly, if you're thinking of buying it... just get the damn thing. Find a way to use it. Convince your boss to let you work from the laptop or something.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Woo

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Be Worth The Extra Money
customer_reviews.text: I hesitantly bought this hoping that it would be as good as the reviews. I am very happy with it. I use a newer Dell XPS 13 and this stand is wonderful. I am surprised at how small it is and yet how high it can lift my laptop. I will easily be able to carry this stand in my back-pack. I am glad I spent the extra money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is very good, portable and does everything you expect a laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very good, portable and does everything you expect a laptop stand to do. Works great. The price is a downside, and beware, if you go to the official site, you can get price of $75 plus they seems to be doing some 15% off promotion right now. I am not sure whether the official site will charge you for shipment, but overall the price there should be better. Overall, the product itself is really great. Ingenious design and robust build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light, portable, useful
customer_reviews.text: Great for when I have to travel and work out of another location for an extended period of time. I bring my apple keyboard and trackpad, and it's very easy to set up and use. The little carry pouch is really handy too. Overall, this is a real quality product that I think will last a long time. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: yg332

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travelers! Light. Folds up small.
customer_reviews.text: If you travel a lot (and even if you don't) this stand will probably be what you're looking for. It's light, holds the laptop well, and folds up nice and small. I am able to put my elbows on the desk and still type with my laptop on the stand. Not as comfortable as when laying flat but doable. Most of the time I use my mouse anyway. A good idea well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: F. M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, screw the other single position stands
customer_reviews.text: you should buy this.... seriously... great quality and you can carry it home after work. fits in my bag easily One year review: still use this thing with my razer blade stealth. honestly you can buy the cheaper one but this is going to hold your 1k+ computer... be smart buy this. it doesnt show signs of wear at all. -professional software developer
customer_reviews.author: Ralph_Fonz

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, thats Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I know this stand is a little pricey, but its worth it. Its very sturdy, and it folds up quick and easy. The feet hold my MacBook in place so no risk of wobbly. The screen height is now so much better than it was, and I can easily make adjustments. Really glad I purchased a Roost!
customer_reviews.author: molaro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ergonomic aid for a tall guy
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best laptop stand around. I'm 6' 4" and I need all the height out of a stand I can get to prevent my neck from dying after a long work session. I throw it in my bag with a Bluetooth keyboard and mouse without even think about it since it's so light and sturdy. If you on the fence because of the price, just get it. Your neck/back will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop Stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this Roost Laptop Stand! When it first arrived I was certain I had paid too much for this little lightweight stand. After using it for one day I've decided it is awesome! My MacBook Pro stays attached and the stand is so lightweight I can easily carry it attached from one room to another - i.e. kitchen counter to coffee table to desk. My neck is so appreciative!
customer_reviews.author: J. Artz

customer_reviews.title: So far so awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's even more compact than I imagined, and it holds up the laptop exactly where I need it, at eye-level. Works great. Nice attention to detail on this product, with quality materials, rubber where you need it, stylish finishings, and a nice carrying case. And made in the USA! Hope it holds up being carried around in a backpack. I intend to be careful with it. I'm very happy with it so far. Wish it were a bit cheaper, but I'm happy to pay for quality on something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.  Most impressive.
customer_reviews.text: As a product designer, I have to say, it is that good. Could it be even taller? Sure, but I’m kind of a long-torsoed taller guy. Is it portable? Yup. I am very impressed. Having used this bad boy for the last 3 months, including travel, I am impressed. And - it already saved my MacBook Pro from an entire glass of electronics-destroying water. Well done. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit pricey but worth it. Easy to set up, easy to adjust on your desk, easy to use throughout the day. I am back and forth in meetings all day long and when I return to my desk I set my laptop down on the stand without issue. Sometimes I'm in a hurry and don't think about it, but the stand is very sturdy and the feet don't slip or slide, which is great. The height is great (and adjustable), too.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie O.

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight, strong and nice-looking
customer_reviews.text: I really like this accessory and I don't regret the money I spent at all. It added an insignificant amount of weight to my backpack, it folds easily and it's surprisingly strong for such a thin construct (but of course, I'm not gonna try its limits, when my laptop is on it, I hardly ever touch the whole thing). Like others, initially I complained because there wasn't an even lower height option, but actually, there is a wisdom to it: the screen should be high enough for you to sit straight up, and this way it forces you to sit properly. Finally, the rubbers on its legs is indeed a nice touch, for additional safety for the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Stelios CY

customer_reviews.title: Ok but too pricy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it works well but I expected something much sturdier. It’s a piece of plastic and looks cheap. I don’t think This is worth it almost $90 so I’m returning it. I’d say this is a $10 thing.

I should create an Amazon affiliate program!

customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for my Lenovo T460s after a glowing recommendation from a friend. He was not wrong. My job requires me to sit at a desk for hours on end, and this stand has made a big difference in neck and shoulder tension at the end of the day.

customer_reviews.title: perfect, ergonomic laptop space
customer_reviews.text: a little pricey but worth it because it will last. I bought it as part of my home office set . I like that its sturdy does not wobble and you can adjust the height. So I can have my laptop about the same height as my montiors. Perfect and great addition to my work space
customer_reviews.author: adigalia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, portable and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly lightweight, portable and functional. I was dubious about the claim that it could handle laptops of any weight. I had a 17" monster that I used this laptop stand with. At first, the laptop stand kept buckling and I thought it was a defect with the product. I later realized that it was because I was centering the laptop around the touchpad, which itself was not in the center of the laptop so the weight wasn't evenly distributed. Once I figured that out, it works like a charm. I take it to work everyday, and it has saved me from many potential neck and headaches!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compared to the NextStand (cheaper knockoff) it is much more ...
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the NextStand (cheaper knockoff) it is much more compact, which is what I wanted when transporting back and forth from the office. One issue with MacBook Pro 2017 15" is that at the highest adjusted height the screen is vertical at it's furthest extension back. So if your head is above the screen, you are not able to adjust it back any further to face upwards.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Use Tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. I've used it daily for months now and it really makes my workspace, well, work. It also adjusts easily between sitting and standing configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and sturdy product that is slim and simple

Not a huge issue.

Obviously you can only use it with an external keyboard and mouse/trackpad (not included), so the portability of the laptop is somewhat compromised, but the Roost is the slimmest and least intrusive of your expanded workstation.
